short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically selects a role and submits the form on the AWS SAML signin page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you selecting the AWS account you work most of the time with by automatically selecting it and submitting the form.
